text:
PromptWorks - Philadelphia, PA. Full time

Seeking a Senior Software Engineer. PromptWorks is the premier dev shop in Philly. We do primarily Ruby, JS and DevOps, but a lot else, too.

Local only, but we offer relocation assistance for the right developer.

More details: https://jobs.github.com/positions/d8f94048-ea66-11e3-82b6-db...
